long_description: The Marmot Cloudbreak 30 synthetic-fill sleeping bag features innovative construction to keep you warm from top to bottom and it's nearly the same weight and packability as a down bag! Thermal R synthetic insulation's excellent loft keeps you warm with minimal weight; innovative wave construction, with overlapping shingles of insulation, prevents cold spots. Body-mapping of insulation directs warmth to key areas and maximizes thermal efficiency. Non-bulky Thermal R maximizes warmth while reducing the adverse effects of perspiration, condensation and humidity inside the sleeping bag. With a European Norm (EN) lower limit rating of 32degF, the Cloudbreak 32 is a versatile bag for mild-weather 3-season adventures. Anatomic 3D hood envelops your head in warmth; Face Muff allows hood to be cinched snug without digging into face. Trapezoidal footbox allows insulation to loft fully around your feet for optimum warmth and comfort. Full-length zipper with a snagless draft tube prevents fabric from snagging in the zipper coils. No more midnight drawcord fumbling-smooth, flat upper cord and hard, round lower cord make hood and collar adjustments easy. Marmot Cloudbreak 30 Sleeping Bag comes with a lightweight stuff sack. European Norm (EN) is an independent third-party temperature rating, allowing accurate comparisons across brands with other EN-rated bags.
